Durability.description: 0: Disappears after triggering? 1: Triggers then deactivates?

Event1.description: Event to fire on TargetList1. Events continued: 11:Return 12:Destroy 13:Start_Moving 14:Reset 15:Rise 16:Descent 17:Start 18:Invert 19:Clear

Shape_Type.description: Shape of the object's collision 0: Box 1: Sphere 2: Cylinder

TargetList0.description: The first list of objects to group

TargetList1.description: The second list of objects to group

TargetList2.description: The third list of objects to group

TargetList3.description: The fourth list of objects to group

Timer0.description: Delay before triggering the first event

Timer1.description: Delay before triggering the second event

Timer2.description: Delay before triggering the third event

Timer3.description: Delay before triggering the fourth event

Trigger.description: Object to target when using TriggerType 1

TriggerType.description: 0: Trigger on Player entry 1: Target an Object

Extra.name: A volume which triggers an event on a list of objects.
